meaningMnemonic: A <radical>drop</radical> of water to a <radical>root</radical> is <kanji>good</kanji>. It's good for the roots to grow and live and thrive. And what's good for roots is good for our plants and us humans too.
readingMnemonic: A <kanji>good</kanji> way to get a lot of drops of water for your roots is to buy a <reading>row</reading> boat (りょう). Then just row out to the middle of the lake and plonk all the roots right into the source!
